title: I.Sicily inscription 000691
support: Fragment of a marble plaque, intact on the lower edge, and probably the right edge (although the face is lost along the edge), preserving the lower right corner. The rear is finished smooth.

layout.p: Remains of two lines, extending to right margin, with substantial space between (large enough for a short intervening line). A guideline is visible between the preserved lines, another parallel to the bottom edge 3.2 cm from the edge.

provenanceFound._: Seen and photographed by Manganaro no later than 1989, but without indication of provenance or current location; observed in store in 2024.
